title: Check Out the Monster Chainring on Josh Tarling’s Pinarello Time Trial Setup
content:
Photo details: Biomimicry and blindingly bright paint still make it hard to overlook the massive chainring on this Pinarello Bolide F TT.

Read the full article at Check Out the Monster Chainring on Josh Tarling’s Pinarello Time Trial Setup on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
